entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
